tweet: On this #VietnamWarVeteransDay we honor and give thanks to all those Veterans who served during the Vietnam War and all the Veterans and active duty military who have answered the call to serve.

My White House Ethics Transparency Act, included in #HR1 will ensure the American ppl know who is working behind closed doors in their government & will stop fed agencies from being flooded w/former lobbyists & consultants whose previous work present serious conflicts of interest

#HR1 includes my Bill, the White House Ethics Transparency Act, which will require the Trump and future Admins to promptly disclose waivers of executive branch ethics rules to the Office of Government Ethics – an independent agency that is authorized to ensure ethics compliance.

I'm proud to see #HR1 pass the House today, a bold ethics reform package created to end the culture of corruption that has overtaken our Nation's capital. We promised to restore our democracy & bring transparency & accountability to Washington & this is a first step #ForThePeople

The Consumer Financial Protection Bureau is a critically important agency that must be fully empowered to serve as an independent watchdog & protect American consumers. Today @FSCDems reviewed the many harmful decisions Trump Admin appointees have made at @CFPB. #ConsumersFirst
